version_description:
* Improved support for iPad Pro.
* Added support for the new Chromecast audio device.
* Increased font size when viewing text files.
* FLAC music files can now be streamed to Chromecast.
* Fixed remote control of video when using bluetooth headsets.
* Fixed iOS 9 multi-tasking views not sizing correctly.
* Fixed copying photos from My Photo Stream.
* Fixed video controls not appearing after using PIP.

* Improved support for iPad Pro.

* Improved image metadata display.
* Improved image resolution on iPad Pro.
* Added .NRW raw photo format support.
* Added “Create PDF File” option for image files.
* The Image Viewer can now attach multiple images as email attachments.
* Improved iOS 9 multitasking slide-over support.
* The document cache can now be disabled.
* Sub-folder searching can now be forced to search-folders or not.
* Font size and character set can now be changed when viewing text files.
* Apple Pencil can now be enabled exclusively when annotating a PDF.
* Added “Scan to PDF” using the built-in camera.
* Pasting clipboard text that is a web link now creates a .url file.
* Fixed audio resuming unexpectedly when WiFi reconnected.
* Fixed document picker view sometimes appearing partly offscreen.

* New integrated image and video viewer.
* New slideshow transitions for images.
* Slideshow settings are now available from the image viewer menu.
* View CBZ and CBR comic files.
* View animated GIFs in the image viewer.
* File date information is now shown in the image viewer.
* Thumbnails are now shown for videos stored on SMB servers.
* Added support for viewing markdown .md files.
* VoiceOver fixes for some toolbar menus.
* Support for Amazon Fire TV device for images.
* Added Recently Imported folder to Photo Library.
* Added support for passing certificate files to Safari.
* SFTP login using a private/public key pair is now permitted if a
key pair file is renamed to machine-name.sftp in My Files.
* Ability to log into web servers when downloading content from a URL.
* Fix showing DNG files with JPG compressed images.
* Fix WebDAV server uploads from Windows 7.
* Fix copying very large files to SFTP servers.
* Fix the ability to handle large number of photos in Photo Library.

Thank you for the feedback on the new features. We're delighted that you like them.

This update is a bug fix release to fix an issue with the document picker on iOS 10, improve image resizing in iOS split-screen mode on iPad Pro, and to fix a popup when passing a file from one app to another.

We have also added a new "Copy to Another App" menu option for files. This allows files to be passed to apps that claim to support the iOS open-in-place feature but don't implement it correctly. If the Share File option no longer works with a particular App, please try "Copy to Another App" instead.

Thanks for your feedback on the new features!

Because a number of editor apps you use don't support Edit In Place correctly, we have restored the "Share File" menu item to its previous functionality, copying files to other apps. Documents in network folders can now be edited in place with an appropriate third-party app using the new "Edit In Place" menu item or new the list view icons.

This update also fixes some bugs with the folder listing view on iOS 10. We support iOS versions from 8.3 and later. We'll try to support older iOS versions for as long as possible.

This update adds some major new features.

Folder Sync now supports two-way syncing. You can create, modify, rename and delete files and folders in a local Sync Files location and the changes will sync back to the server when you are next online.

Photo & video slideshows can now be created by selecting files and folders and these will be remembered within a new section in Locations. Just tap on any slideshow or a photo within a slideshow to start from that point.

Content uploaded via Google's Drive Backup & Sync desktop app is now accessible through our Google Drive connector.

Folder List View mode now supports pinch to zoom. Maximise the amount of information on your screen, or zoom in to see the detail.

Thumbnails are now generated for PDF documents. Switch to Grid View mode and zoom in to easily identify documents by their contents.

Importing from other apps or iCloud now supports multi-file selection, and also allows folders to be imported in one operation.

PDF documents now support links to other documents.

Thank you for using our apps and for providing us with feedback. We love to hear how our apps help you to make the most out of your iPad / iPhone.

Our final update for the year contains a number of fixes and improvements

* Added support for CAF audio files and CR3 RAW image files.

* Added support for HTTPS URLs in .m3u playlist files.

* Sync Files will now continue running when the device is locked.

* Bookmarks to local Sync Files folders has been fixed.

* Fixed issues on iOS 13 when a Startup Password is in force.

* Fixed an issue when linking multiple OneDrive accounts.

* Fixed thumbnail extraction from NEF image files.

We're working hard on a major update. If you would like to participate in beta testing, please email us at info@stratospherix.com.

Just a few fixes and features before we embark on beta-testing the next major update.

* We redesigned the Rename popup to be much wider.

* We added an automatic file-recovery feature when editing text files.

* Searching within sub-folders now works as expected.

* We restored 1.75x playback speed for videos and added audio pitch-adjustment.

* A Home-screen launch icon to a sub-folder on a USB drive now works as expected.

We're about to start the first wave of beta testing for our major update. If you would like to participate in this, please email us at info@stratospherix.com.

This update adds some great new features, and a number of bug fixes.

* A collapsable side-bar on iPad provides easy access to Home Screen locations.
* Access to SMB servers from the Files app is now independent of FileBrowser.
* EML files can now be viewed and attachments saved.
* When Folder Searching you can now enter multiple keywords.
* Improved performance and resilience of Backup Tasks.
* 2-factor auth for pCloud now supports EU servers.
* Each Sync Task now has its own log file.
* The date and file size is now shown on file context menu in grid mode.
* Added support for WEBP image files.

* Fixed crash when dragging tabs on iOS 14.
* Fixed timezone of files renamed via Batch Rename.
* Fixed streaming from SFTP servers.
* Fixed a crash with iXpand drives.
* Fixed an issue with Unicode characters with iXpand drives.

We have been working tirelessly to add new features and fix issues reported by our users. We have also improved general performance behind the scenes to make the app experience as smooth as possible.

New features for Photographers
* Display XMP star-ratings for photos in the folder listing.
* Sort photos in a folder by their star-rating.
* Star-rate photos with keyboard shortcuts straight from Gallery view

New general features
* The config pages have been reorganised to provide easier navigation.
* Sync and Backup tasks can now have file, folder or extension exclusions.
* The PDF index and table of contents popup is now navigable in a hierarchical view.
* Text can now be selected and copied when viewing a text file.
* The File/Folder summary view can now be launched for a selection of files and folders.
* Batch rename by EXIF date shows improved progress info.
* Switch between photos or documents in Gallery view using keyboard shortcuts.

Bug Fixes
* Improved PDF view on iPhones with a notch.
* Improved thumbnail extraction for ePub documents.
* Fixed screen layout issues that sometimes occurred when launching a Bookmark.
* Fixed tapping on a music file in an iCloud folder only queuing 1 track.
* Improved connection help documents.
* Improved memory usage and overall performance.
* Added new config file settings 'offlineSyncFileExclusions' and 'offlineRemoteIsBackupRoot' for sync/backup tasks.

Thank you for helping to make our apps better. If you would like to rate or leave a review on the App Store, we look forward to hearing your feedback.

* Star-rate photos with keyboard shortcuts straight from Gallery view

New general features
* The config pages have been reorganised to provide easier navigation.
* Sync and Backup tasks can now have file, folder or extension exclusions.
* The PDF index and table of contents popup is now navigable in a hierarchical view.
* Text can now be selected and copied when viewing a text file.
* The File/Folder summary view can now be launched for a selection of files and folders.
* Batch rename by EXIF date shows improved progress info.
* Switch between photos or documents in Gallery view using keyboard shortcuts.

Bug Fixes
* Improved PDF view on iPhones with a notch.
* Improved thumbnail extraction for ePub documents.
* Fixed screen layout issues that sometimes occurred when launching a Bookmark.
* Fixed tapping on a music file in an iCloud folder only queuing 1 track.
* Improved connection help documents.
* Improved memory usage and overall performance.
* Added new config file settings 'offlineSyncFileExclusions' and 'offlineRemoteIsBackupRoot' for sync/backup tasks.
